content.html:
TOUCH SCREEN MODE


Choose the shooting operations performed using touch controls.

ModeDescription
AFAFIn focus mode S (AF-S), the camera focuses when you tap your subject in the display. Focus locks at the current distance until you tap the AF OFF icon. In focus mode C (AF-C), the camera initiates focus when you
←AFtap your subject display. The camera will continue to adjust focus for changes in the distance to the subject until you tap the AF icon. on the selected subject using autofocus.
[AF] OFFOFFOFF In manual focus mode (MF), you can tap the display to focus
AREAAREATap to select a point for focus or zoom. The focus frame will move to the selected point.
OFFOFFTouch screen mode off.

● The behavior of the touch screen varies with the AF mode.
● To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indica-
tor, select OFF for 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN
SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.


The
Shooting
Menus
162
content.markdown:
# TOUCH SCREEN MODE

# Choose the shooting operations performed using touch controls.

| Mode | Mode | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| AF | AF | In focus mode S (AF-S), the camera focuses when you tap your subject in the display. Focus locks at the current distance until you tap the AF OFF icon. In focus mode C (AF-C), the camera initiates focus when you |
| ← | AF | tap your subject display. The camera will continue to adjust focus for changes in the distance to the subject until you tap the AF icon. on the selected subject using autofocus. |
| [AF] OFF | OFF | OFF In manual focus mode (MF), you can tap the display to focus |
| AREA | AREA | Tap to select a point for focus or zoom. The focus frame will move to the selected point. |
| OFF | OFF | Touch screen mode off. |


- ● The behavior of the touch screen varies with the AF mode.
- ● To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indica-
- tor, select OFF for 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN
- SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.


The
Shooting
Menus
